sections.heading: 01|Members of legislative authority
sections.text: Effective:March 2, 1992Latest Legislation:House Bill 228 - 119th General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDF(A) Except as provided in divisions (B) and (D) of this section, the legislative power of each city shall be vested in, and exercised by, a legislative a

sections.heading: 41, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not apply to any municipal corporation which adopts its own charter containing an initiative and referendum provision for its own ordinances and other legislative measures
sections.text: 41, inclusive, of the Revised Code do not apply to any municipal corporation which adopts its own charter containing an initiative and referendum provision for its own ordinances and other legislative measures.
